com.wesleyware.daowiz
Class RecordDao

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.wesleyware.daowiz.RecordDao
public abstract class RecordDao
extends java.lang.Object

This is a generic DAO that will be inherited by each table specific DAO to contain custom code. The data access methods should be overloaded to take the correct record type and given public access.

Author:
Wesley Williams

                       Record record)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
